name: Dragonis Legends Hunter Quest
description:
Dragonis Legends Hunter Quest

Dragonis Legends, a beautiful, open-world fantasy RPG set in fantastic lands.

Dragonis Legends, an open world fantasy RPG set in fantastic lands! Go on a fantastic journey to explore this vast open-world. Face hundreds of enemies, upgrade your hero's skills & stat, and become the Legend of Dragonis Land.

!EARLY ACCESS!

Be aware: the game is still under heavy development, you can experience bugs, glitches, and more. Follow us on our social channels to find more about upcoming updates, and to participate in pools and discussions for future updates

A VAST 3D OPEN-WORLD

Explore the vast lands of Dragonis Land. A vast 3D open-world fully explorable: visit villages, explore dungeons, meet new characters, and conquer fields.

UPGRADE YOUR CHARACTER

Customize your character, increase stats and upgrade your skills like in a real AAA RPG game.

FANTASTIC WEAPONS AND ARMOR

Collect materials to craft awesome weapons and armor. Upgrade your weapons, customize your armor and become the strongest.

 

LOTS OF QUESTS

Explore the lands of Dragonis Land, get to know the characters, help them on their travels and complete hundreds of quests.)

 

CO-OP (COMING SOON)

Play together with your friends, complete quests, explore the vast open world online with your friends.

GAME FEATURES:

  • Big 3D open-world multiplayer RPG game. You can fully explore the 3D world of Dragonis Land.
  • Skills and stats: upgrade your character’s skills and stats.
  • Lots of weapons and armors: customize your character with amazing weapons and armors! Upgrade them to became even stronger.
  • Optimized for mobile phones: this game runs smoothly on mobile phones, it’s been specially optimized to run smoothly even on old devices.
  • Huge map: a big map for a big game, fully explorable, with dungeons, villages and more.
  • Co-op: play online with your friends, and explore the vast 3d open-world togheter!
  • Constantly new updates: stay up to date on the latest news. This game is constantly updated, follow us on our social channels to stay updated on the latest news.
  • High-quality gameplay: you will have a ton of fun, the controls are easy to understand and highly customizable
  • Stunning 3d high-quality graphic. The PC’s graphic... On a mobile phone device!

 

Play online with your friend in this awesome multiplayer online and offline RPG game! Take on quests with your friends, explore the vast 3D open-world, and more! Up to 8 player per room.
